name: grd
description: A CSS grid framework using Flexbox.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && postcss --use postcss-apply --use autoprefixer --use postcss-csso --output dist/grd.css src/grd.css
scripts.build:sass: node-sass src/grd.scss dist/grd.css && postcss --use autoprefixer --use postcss-csso --output dist/grd.css dist/grd.css
